name: GPT-UA
title: GPT-UA - free ChatGPT assistant
welcomeMessage: We've created a group where you can ask questions and stay updated with the latest site news:

errors.internal: Sorry, an unknown error occurred. Please try again.
errors.notEnoughDetails: Please provide more details for your request.
errors.insecureContext: This feature is only available in a secure context (HTTPS) in some or all supported browsers.
errors.apiKey: The API '{{key}}' is not attached to any budget. Please, make sure the site URL is correct.

mode.note_default: Chat GPT-3.5 can't browse the web or see pictures, but it's the cheapest and fastest mode for everyday tasks.
mode.note_gpt4: Chat GPT-4 can see pictures, understands better and is suitable for complex questions, but it is more expensive and slower.
mode.note_gpt4+: Chat GPT4+ is able to generate images and research information online, but it costs more and usually takes longer.
mode.note_mistral: Mistral is a new open-source model developed in EU. It is less restricted than GPT3.5. Works best in English.
